title: Banner
description: Displays a form banner or a component that looks like a banner.

body.raw: ## banner Displays a form banner field or a component that looks like an banner field. ### Installation CLI Manual ```bash npx shadcn@latest add "https://designali.in/r/styles/default/banner" ``` Copy and paste the following code into your project. Update the import paths to match your project setup. ### Props | Prop | Type | Description | Default | | ---- | ---- | ----------- | ------- |
